# GitHub Repository Metadata

## Suggested Repository Topics

Add these topics to your GitHub repository for better discoverability:

```
data-analysis
factory-4-0
fastapi
react-dashboard
computer-vision-telemetry
smart-manufacturing
productivity-analytics
iot-analytics
real-time-monitoring
industrial-ai
typescript
python
docker
sqlite
workforce-analytics
manufacturing-execution-system
```

## How to Add Topics

1. Go to your GitHub repository page
2. Click "About" (gear icon) in the right sidebar
3. In the "Topics" field, add the topics listed above
4. Click "Save changes"

## Repository Description

**Suggested Description:**
```
Real-time AI-powered worker productivity dashboard for smart factories. Tracks workforce efficiency through CCTV analytics with FastAPI backend, React frontend, and Docker deployment.
```

## Repository Social Preview

**Suggested social preview image:**
- Use a screenshot from the dashboard (preferably the full dashboard view)
- Recommended dimensions: 1280x640px
- Should show: KPI cards, worker leaderboard, and workstation grid

Upload at: Settings ‚Üí Options ‚Üí Social Preview ‚Üí Edit
